patthana16.42:4.1: Paccuppanno hetu dhammo naatītassa nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana16.42:4.2: Paccuppanno hetu dhammo naanāgatassa nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana16.42:4.3: Paccuppanno hetu dhammo naatītassa nahetussa ca naanāgatassa nahetussa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana16.42:4.5: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā cha, anantare tīṇi … pe … sahajāte tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
